content:
[TTT: HR & Culture Synthesis]

DATA AVAILABILITY SUMMARY:
- LinkedIn Company Page: Blocked (auth required) - MANUAL CHECK NEEDED
- Glassdoor Reviews: Not found
- Careers Page: Check result above
- Job Boards: Check results above

HEADCOUNT ESTIMATION (Inference):
Based on company stage signals (BNP Paribas acceleration, .io domain, 2020s founding):

FORMULA:
  estimated_headcount = base_for_stage * regional_multiplier

  If acceleration stage: base = 12-25
  If post-acceleration: base = 20-40
  Regional multiplier (Africa ops): 1.2-1.5x (more staff for local support)

ESTIMATE: 15-50 employees (confidence: 30%)

TEAM COMPOSITION INFERENCE:
Typical for fintech SaaS at this stage:
- Engineering: 40-50% (6-20 people)
- Sales/Customer Success: 25-30% (4-12 people)
- Operations/Support: 15-20% (3-8 people)
- Leadership/Admin: 10-15% (2-5 people)

CULTURE SIGNALS:
Without Glassdoor/LinkedIn data, culture assessment is impossible.
INTEGRITY RISK: Cannot validate any culture claims.

KEY HIRES TO WATCH:
- CTO/VP Engineering: Technology credibility
- Country Manager (Nigeria/Kenya): Local market commitment
- Head of Compliance: Regulatory seriousness
- VP Sales: Commercial maturity

HIRING VELOCITY INFERENCE:
- Active job postings = growth phase
- No job postings = maintenance/pivot/cash conservation
- Cannot determine without job board data

CERTAINTY: Very Low (minimal verifiable data)
